name: Movie & TV Show Tracker
description: Your Notion Watchlist CompanionCreate a personalized watchlist to ensure you never miss out on watching a fantastic movie or TV show.Genre Cataloging: Categorize and sort your watchlist by your favourite genres.Dedicated Watch Lists: Maintain separate watchlists for movies and TV shows, so nothing gets mixed up.Release Tracking: Stay updated with release dates and platforms, so you're always in the loop.Quick Additions: Speedily add new titles to your watchlist with the button blocks.Watch Histo
features: Genre Cataloging: Categorize and sort your watchlist by your favourite genres.; Dedicated Watch Lists: Maintain separate watchlists for movies and TV shows, so nothing gets mixed up.; Release Tracking: Stay updated with release dates and platforms, so you're always in the loop.; Quick Additions: Speedily add new titles to your watchlist with the button blocks.; Watch History: Maintain a log of your recently viewed and all-time favourites for easy recall and re-watching.
